Steam doesn't allow you to add a review unless you played it for at least 5 minutes(I think). Opened the game, connected to blizzard, got the achievements, and then dipped. Sad that a 71.93 billion dollar company cant put time, resources, and effort into skill trees so that players can play characters they know and love in cool , customized ways. But hey at least we get a battle pass and some new skins. Funniest part is they WAITED to tell people that they wernt giving us the PVE mode they advertised after the fact that the game came out. Such a sad ending to what WAS a iconic game. RIP

This company doesn't what you think about the game or if you even continue to play it. They just want you to install the game, buy the skins, and uninstall. they take forever to update and patch game breaking bugs and don't care if there is a character that is completely overpowering all the others they will fix it when they fix it and your the one who has to deal with it. Many times they will patch things like quick play back fill issues then when you get into a game and someone leaves there will be no back fill. They fix ranked queue so that you will be more equally matched then your fighting grand masters in a plat qp lobby. The company needs to stop trying to farm the player base for money and start listening to them, at least a little.

tldr; you either play the only good tank in the game or you loose.

500+ hours played.  I am the player base.  I have 10+ skins for every classic character.  5+ legendary for most of the characters I play.

1) This game runs great on linux/steam.  Thanks valve.
2) I want the d**n 6v6 gameplay i paid for originally when i bought this game.  Why am I forced to this crappy 5v5 garbage?  It sucks.  I have to 90% of the time heal one tank, there is 0 strategy in 5v5.  Heal mostly the tank and everyone else a little bit.
3) Blizzard is shit at game passes, its been shit since it went woke.  The reason game pass is so successful for epic is because epic gives you so much stuff that you feel bad not buying stuff from them at least once every 3 months.  I've spent $100+ a year on rocket league.
4) Game Pass for characters is Tarded.  Imagine if any epic game that is successful, put characters on their game pass.  They would fail too.   Only skins. ONLY SKINS TARDS.

Maybe Microsoft gives a sh*t and fixes this, maybe it doesn't.  I think Microsoft is likely to not be much different than blizzard though.  As soon as I get 6v6 back, I will turn this review back positive.   Whatever this new gay version of the game is, I am not interested...I want the old overwatch back.  I am glad I put like 2-3 years of playing a lot into this game before the switch over cause I will always have nostalgia of the greatness of what this game used to be.

Edit: the more I play this game, the more pissed off I get.  Not for winning or loosing.  But this game is so much more garbage than then the original.  I want the game back that I used to enjoy...
:D
